text: Randersacker is a market town and municipality in Lower Franconia, a part of Bavaria, Germany. It is in Würzburg, and it is next to the Würzburg boroughs Heidingsfeld, Rottenbauer, Sanderau and Frauenland and to the municipalities of Gerbrunn, Theilheim and Eibelstadt. == Geography == Randersacker is in the south of Würzburg. This part of the Main is called . The city of Würzburg is about three miles away from the village center of Randersacker. There are two subdistricts: Lindelbach and the main part Randersacker. ==References== Category:Würzburg (district)
title: Randersacker
